targets.query:
from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "NanoPK_25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["slug"] == "nanopk-25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "outdoor_temperature" or r["_field"] == "outdoor_temperature_average")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "BUFFER")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["slug"] == "nanopk-25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "buffer_temperature_bottom" or r["_field"] == "max_requirement" or r["_field"] == "buffer_temperature_center" or r["_field"] == "buffer_temperature_top")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "NanoPK_25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["slug"] == "nanopk-25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "heater_temperature_current" or r["_field"] == "heater_temperature_target" or r["_field"] == "smoke_temperature")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "BUFFER")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["slug"] == "nanopk-25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "buffer_charge")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "NanoPK_25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["slug"] == "nanopk-25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "efficiency")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "BUFFER")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["slug"] == "nanopk-25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pump_active")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "NanoPK_25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["slug"] == "nanopk-25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state" )

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "BUFFER")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["slug"] == "nanopk-25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "buffer_temperature_bottom" or r["_field"] == "buffer_temperature_center" or r["_field"] == "buffer_temperature_top")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DIFFERENCE_CONTROLLER")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["slug"] == "nanopk-25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "source_temperature" or r["_field"] == "target_1_temperature")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DIFFERENCE_CONTROLLER")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["slug"] == "nanopk-25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pump_active")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "DIFFERENCE_CONTROLLER")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["slug"] == "nanopk-25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "power" or r["_field"] == "power_counter_day")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "FUSSBODENHEIZUNG")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["slug"] == "nanopk-25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "flow_temperature_current" or r["_field"] == "flow_temperature_target" or r["_field"] == "room_temperature_current" or r["_field"] == "room_temperature_target")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "FUSSBODENHEIZUNG")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["slug"] == "nanopk-25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pump_active")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HEIZKOERPER")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["slug"] == "nanopk-25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "flow_temperature_current" or r["_field"] == "flow_temperature_target" or r["_field"] == "room_temperature_current" or r["_field"] == "room_temperature_target")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HEIZKOERPER")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["slug"] == "nanopk-25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pump_active")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "BUFFER")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "max_requirement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["slug"] == "nanopk-25")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "BOILER")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["slug"] == "nanopk-25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "boiler_temperature_target")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "FUSSBODENHEIZUNG")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "flow_temperature_target")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["slug"] == "nanopk-25")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HEIZKOERPER")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "flow_temperature_target")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["slug"] == "nanopk-25")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "NanoPK_25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["slug"] == "nanopk-25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "fuel_stock")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "NanoPK_25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["slug"] == "nanopk-25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "fuel_stock")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "NanoPK_25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["slug"] == "nanopk-25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "fuel_stock")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last)
  |> difference()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * -1.0 }))

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: ${__from:date}, stop: ${__to:date})

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["slug"] == "nanopk-25")
